headline: Is Enphase Energy Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: Enphase Energy has significantly underperformed the Nasdaq over the past year, and analysts are cautious about the stock’s prospects.

raw.headline: Is Enphase Energy Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
raw.summary: Enphase Energy has significantly underperformed the Nasdaq over the past year, and analysts are cautious about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Enphase Expands Solargraf Platform With Financing, AI, and Japan Launch
summary: Enphase upgrades its Solargraf solar platform with financing integrations, faster proposals, and entry into Japan.

raw.headline: Enphase Expands Solargraf Platform With Financing, AI, and Japan Launch
raw.summary: Enphase upgrades its Solargraf solar platform with financing integrations, faster proposals, and entry into Japan.

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell ENPH and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Shareholders of Enphase would probably like to forget the past six months even happened. The stock dropped 38.5% and now trades at $38.31. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.

raw.headline: 3 Reasons to Sell ENPH and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
